title: Robberies
description: Tara's life was dull to say the least. One day, while working her fast food job, a handsome stranger walks in. She finds herself doing something spontaneous with him only to have it backfire when, moments later, he comes back and robs the store. He takes her as his hostage. Tara is forced into a life unlike anything she could imagine. She is dragged from place to place, pushed to the verge of madness. She wonders if there is any escape from this obsessive robber and company. To survive, she must cling to everything she can before he steals it all away.
author: Leona Keyoko Pink
